questions.question: What is the name of the national park near this location?
questions.explanation: North Cascades National Park is located near this location. It is known for its rugged mountains, glaciers, and pristine wilderness.

questions.question: What is the highest peak in this area?
questions.explanation: Mount Rainier is the highest peak in this area. It is an active stratovolcano and is the most glaciated peak in the contiguous United States.

questions.question: Which river runs through this area?
questions.explanation: The Columbia River runs through this area. It is the largest river in the Pacific Northwest region of North America.

questions.question: What is the average annual rainfall in this area?
questions.explanation: The average annual rainfall in this area is approximately 100 inches. The abundant rainfall contributes to the lush green forests and diverse ecosystem.

questions.question: What is the main attraction for outdoor enthusiasts in this area?
questions.explanation: Hiking is the main attraction for outdoor enthusiasts in this area. There are numerous trails and breathtaking landscapes to explore.
